review: This was a breeze to set up...i did it in two minutes. Works as advertised. .
author: Donna

review: Although I purchased my Fire Stick from Staples, I have found it to be extremely easy to use andwork with, I unfortunately don't have experience with the larger version or with competitors's product.But I really like it, simple and direct with Amazon Prime or with others works great.Eventually I will get one for every TV in the house.
author: Leonard R Smith

review: I got the Fire TV Stick as a gift and Love it.  It's very user friendly and the picture is great.
author: Timothy M. Wilson

review: Remote keep dropping Signal I will be app on your smart phone it's better
author: Timothy golden

review: Only complaint I have about the fire stick is that the cord goes into the stick on the side and it was a very tight fit with the TV. I could see it not working with some TVs.
author: Kelsey

review: Lightening fast streaming and easy to use interface. Great product.
author: Fredo "Fredo"

review: Easy to install and good performance.
author: Chuck

review: Does not work as expected. Cuts in and out all the time and we have top of the line Internet service as my wife works from home .Prime works fine through the WII.
author: Darren
